item.description:
They've finally released the times for the first three postseason games and your Cubs play Wednesday night at 6:30 PM, so come on out and cheer on your Chicago Cubs!

About the Sports Depot
Watch all of Boston's favorite teams in action...the RED SOX, CELTICS, BRUINS and PATRIOTS as well as all of our local colleges and other professional sports on our big screen plasma television's.! There isn't a bad seat in the place.

http://www.sportsdepo...

Menu:
http://www.sportsdepo...

Directions:
Four (4) miles from the Fleet Center and Fenway Park.
Take the Mass Pike (east or west) to the Allston/Brighton Exit. Follow signs for Allston, which puts you directly on Cambridge Street. At the fourth set of lights take a right and you will be at the entrance to the parking lot.

http://www.sportsdepo...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign.

group.name: Chicago Sports Club of New England

item.name: Game 1 : Cubs vs Dodgers
